Grand Magister Winonin:
You need to know about the Forbidden Gates at the Outpost Aden. This place is now filled with dark energy, due to the fact that the Goddess of Death drew to The gates of your eyes. And new angry spirits Shillien waiting for an opportunity to attack Aden.
Our brave Aden vanguard found in dungeon lair of the evil creatures and tried to destroy it. The Braves were missing, and we was going to send reconnaissance detachment to the rescue. It would be nice if You took this case.
